About Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP)

strong: Make your own website in a few clicks!

Your landing page speed can make the difference between converting or losing a customer. Most mobile site visitors leave a page that takes more than 3 seconds to load. Yet most mobile sites miss that mark by an average of 19 seconds (Source). To set yourself apart from the competition, optimize your landing page experience with AMP.

p.strong: Faster landing pages typically lead to more conversions, and AMP allows you to create pages that load quickly. Combining speed and smoother loading, AMP landing pages often give people much better landing page experiences. Landing page experience is an important factor for your Quality Score and Ad Rank.
